main.name: Meet Savani

resume.skillmessage: I am skilled in developing Fornt-end Web applications

education.degree: Bachelors of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Programmed responsive, interactive, and easy to operate websites and mobile applications for clients.
Develop a responsive website from scratch, with an excellent user experience.
Collaborate with designers to create simple, clean, and intuitive interfaces.
Delivered products on time by collaboratively working with the design team, client team, and senior management.
Improved client experience worldwide by offering constant support, feedback, and personalized solutions.
Tested performance on cross-browser compatibility, customized features, and overall usage.
Increased revenue for the company by building projects using the latest technologies to attract new clients.

work.title: Web Developer
description: Developed an easily navigable Mozilla Gujarat Website that helps the tech community stay connected with the knowledge of upcoming events, and clubs (www.mozguj.org).
Designed an informative website named  Cross World Estate Website for real estate businesses to improve the overall performance and client experience.
Created simple React Personal Projects on MERN Stack, and React Website for Aarna Jewels, Surat.
Provided technical solutions to clients related to web hosting and troubleshooting problems related to DNS, web hosting, email setups, and domain issues.
